RPY_DYFLOW.LINE: CALL SUBSCREEN tab_sub INCLUDING g_tb_tab-prog g_tb_tab-subscreen.
LOOP AT gt_path_h WITH CONTROL path_h_tc CURSOR
LOOP AT gt_werks WITH CONTROL werks_tc CURSOR werks_tc-current_line.
LOOP AT gt_lgort WITH CONTROL lgort_tc CURSOR lgort_tc-current_line.
LOOP AT gt_path_t WITH CONTROL path_t_tc CURSOR
FIELD sel_werks-pathn MODULE check_pathn ON REQUEST.
FIELD sel_werks-werks MODULE check_werks ON REQUEST.
LOOP AT gt_excel WITH CONTROL excel_tc CURSOR excel_tc-current_line.
CALL SUBSCREEN tab_sub INCLUDING g_list_tab-prog g_list_tab-subscreen.

RSMPE_TITT.TEXT: 通灵多角贸易配置平台-Present.chen
